ui.settings-view.advanced-settings-warni: Only change these settings if you know what you're doing
ui.settings-view.app-key-tooltip: The app key to be used to call the Dropbox API
ui.settings-view.refresh-token-tooltip: The refresh token to be used when calling the Dropbox API
messages.settings-view-model.failed-open: Couldn't open the url in your browser, copied the url to your clipboard.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-retr: An error occured while retrieving the code, check the logs for more information.
messages.settings-view-model.query-no-co: Couldn't finish the authentication process because the the api didn't return a code.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-get-: An error occured while retrieving the token response, check the logs for more information.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-auth: Couldn't finish the authentication process because the the api didn't return a token.
